00030 RainbruRPG::Network::npIdentification::npIdentification()
00031   :NetPacketBase(NPI_GEN_IDENT){
00032

00042 RainbruRPG::Network::npIdentification::npIdentification(tNetworkClientType t)
00043   :NetPacketBase(NPI_GEN_IDENT){
00044

00046   setClientType(t);

00072 void RainbruRPG::Network::npIdentification::netSerialize(){
00073   if (clientType==NCT_UNKNOWN){
00074     LOGW("The client type is not set");
00075   }
00076   data->packetIdentifier=GUINT16_TO_LE(this->id);
00077 
00078   data->clientType=GUINT16_TO_LE(this->clientType);
00079 }
00080 
00087 void RainbruRPG::Network::npIdentification::netDeserialize(){
00088   // Note the explicit cast from integer to enum type ^^
00089   this->id=static_cast<RainbruRPG::Network::tNetPacketIdentifier>
00090     GUINT16_FROM_LE(data->packetIdentifier);
00091 
00092   this->clientType=static_cast<RainbruRPG::Network::tNetworkClientType>
00093     GUINT16_FROM_LE(data->clientType);
00094 }
00095

00102   return data->data;
00103 }

00110 size_t RainbruRPG::Network::npIdentification::getDataLength(){
00111   return sizeof(data->data);

00120 void RainbruRPG::Network::npIdentification::
00121 setData(enet_uint8* d, size_t len){

00144 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::npIdentification::
00145 clientTypeToString(RainbruRPG::Network::tNetworkClientType t){
00146 
00147   const char* ret;
00148 
00149   switch (t){
00150   case NCT_FLOODER:
00151     ret="NetFlooder";
00152     break;
00153 
00154   case NCT_EDITOR:
00155     ret="Editor";
00156     break;
00157 
00158   case NCT_GAME:  
00159     ret="Game";
00160     break;
00161 
00162   case NCT_UNKNOWN:
00163     ret="Unknown";
00164     break;
00165 
00166   default:
00167     ret="Default";
00168     break;
00169 
00170   }
00171 
00172   return ret;
00173 
00174 }
